// FormatTime function to convert seconds to hours, minutes, and seconds
export const formatTime=time=>{const seconds=Math.floor(time%60);const minutes=Math.floor(time/60%60);const hours=Math.floor(time/3600);return"".concat(hours>0?"".concat(hours," hours "):'').concat(minutes>0?"".concat(minutes," minutes and "):"").concat(seconds>0?"".concat(seconds," seconds"):"".concat(seconds," seconds"));};
